name: web-seo-analysis-project
description: This project's main goal is to create various analyses for websites **using Node.js**. The project will **analyze different aspects of websites** such as links, images, scripts, style files, texts, page sizes, header, meta, heading information and so on. This project will also **check the website's compatibility based on Google's SEO criteria.** These analyses will **prove detailed reports aiming to increase website performance and SEO compatibility.**
author: boraswim
